# Method

1. Participants 
  a. How many participants will participate in the study 
  b. Who will participate in the study
  c. Where are they from
  d. Age of participants 

2. Materials 
  a. What are the materials used
  b. how were they developed
  c. Are they your own materials

3. Design
  a. describe design of the study 
  b. what variables will be measured
 
4. Procedure 
  a. How was the experiment conducted in order; step by step
